channel.title: I think we should start backing up
channel.description: I have been reading alot of crap about how jagex is taking down websites and downloads, so i think we should backup mopar because what if we try to go to mopar tommorow and it has been shut down.. it really could happen..

item.title: I think we should start backing up
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’m sure there are regular backups here. Any damage done can always be reversed also.

But jagex wont shut down moparscape so dont worry.

Read full topic
item.source: I think we should start backing up

item.title: I think we should start backing up
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Tree:

There’s nothing worth backing up.

^
This.

Not to mention; there has been several threads created about this particular subject. It’s getting old.

Read full topic
item.source: I think we should start backing up

item.title: I think we should start backing up
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

poopoo999:

I have been reading alot of crap about how jagex is taking down websites and downloads, so i think we should backup mopar because what if we try to go to mopar tommorow and it has been shut down… it really could happen…

There’s nothing worth backing up.

Read full topic

item.title: I think we should start backing up
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

They can’t and won’t shut us down, they tried before and mitb shut them up. If they try again they’ll get the same.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/lawstuff

Read full topic
